alert.note: Alert for Kittson (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 8:23AM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Dakota...Minnesota... Red River of the North at Drayton affecting Pembina, Kittson, Walsh and Marshall Counties. Red River of the North at Oslo affecting Grand Forks, Walsh, Polk and Marshall Counties. Red River of the North at East Grand Forks affecting Grand Forks and Polk Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Dakota...Minnesota... Red River of the North at Pembina affecting Pembina and Kittson Counties. Red River of the North at Fargo affecting Cass and Clay Counties. .All sites on the Red River have crested. Recessions in river levels are expected over the next seven days. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red River of the North at Pembina. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 46.6 feet, MN 175 bridge (south of Pembina and north of Drayton) approaches flood (MN DOT). * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 46.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:30 AM CDT Saturday was 46.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall out of moderate flood stage below 44.0 feet next Friday. - Flood stage is 39.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
